name: Nyctomorph
description:
Nyctomorph is a short survival adventure game in which the player has to survive the night, alone in a dark forest, with only a campfire and a handful of twigs scattered about.

Don't stray far from the light... who knows what could be lurking about?

CONTROLS

Movement: WASD
Interact: E
Consume: Q
Pause: ESC
Change Theme: T

EXTRA

A game made for the 5th Nokia 3310 Game Jam game jam.

All feedback is welcome and encouraged!

Thank you for playing, please enjoy!!

There may be some display issues for certain browsers or devices. We apologize.
